

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgkey, configuration_value as cfgvalue
                          from product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'flsnple8c01cj31podmib4nhg5'
            and expiry > '1354782615';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point,
                                  thousands_point, decimal_places, value
                          from currencies;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'flsnple8c01cj31podmib4nhg5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgkey, configuration_value as cfgvalue
                          from product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'or8pdgsnkqa8eluf9vcupom0p6'
            and expiry > '1354782615';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point,
                                  thousands_point, decimal_places, value
                          from currencies;
